data.title: Bitcoin Faces Critical Cost Threshold, Potential for Significant Rebound
data.description: According to BlockBeats, glassnode has reported that Bitcoin is once again testing the crucial cost threshold of approximately $109,000, identified as the 0.85 cost zone. Historically, this level has served as a significant dividing line. Maintaining this level often leads to substantial rebounds, while failing to hold it typically results in further declines to the 0.75 cost zone, around $98,000.

data.title: Fed's Commitment to Inflation Target Questioned Amid Employment Balance
data.description: According to BlockBeats, Federal Reserve official Schmid has stated that the employment market is generally balanced, but inflation remains excessively high. He noted that a potential interest rate cut could challenge the Fed's commitment to its 2% inflation target.

data.title: Over 50 Million USDC Destroyed in Treasury Transaction
data.description: According to PANews, Whale Alert has reported that more than 50.24 million USDC were recently destroyed in the USDC Treasury. The transaction is valued at approximately 50.23 million USD.

data.title: Radiant Capital hacker transfers 5,400 ETH to Tornado Cash: PeckShield
data.description:
Radiant Capital hacker has moved over 5,400 Ethereum (ETH) tokens. Blockchain security firm PeckShield says the exploiter moved the ETH to crypto mixer Tornado Cash. Radiant Capital suffered a $50 million security breach in October 2024
source: https://coinjournal.net/news/radiant-capital-hacker-transfers-5400-eth-to-tornado-cash-peckshield/

data.title: The People's Bank of China: Studying ways to promote the use of digital yuan in cross-border payments.
data.description: The People's Bank of China (PBOC) released the "2025 RMB Internationalization Report," which details the current progress and future plans for RMB internationalization. The report notes that five central banks (monetary authorities), including the PBOC, have officially joined the multilateral central bank digital currency bridge. In the outlook section, the PBOC states that it will build an independent and controllable RMB cross-border payment system and study and promote the use of digital RMB in cross-border payments.

data.title: Binance Futures will launch pre-market trading of CCUSDT perpetual contracts.
data.description: According to an official announcement, Binance Futures will launch pre-market trading of CCUSDT perpetual contracts on October 31, 2025 at 20:00 (Beijing time), with a maximum leverage of 5x. (This news item was generated with AI assistance.)
